本件保存
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
+
May 29, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: Excess Equipment Project No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
The enclosed list of excess equipment can be utilized by Keelung Harbor Bureau.
We suggest that necessary action be taken to procure these items for KIHB's use. 140.112.213.82 For your convenience also enclosed is the pertinent catalogue information.
Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
Man Whenthings
Chas. G. Van Ness, Jp. Assistant Project Manager
